titleStmt.title: By the mayor to all constables, beadles, and other His Majesties officers and loving subjects within the city of London, and every of them.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

notesStmt.note: Order to apprehend persons defacing or pulling down proclamations.
Right half of sheet contains "The oath of the constables within the City of London."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England)
